00066 CompilerOutputPanel::CompilerOutputPanel( wxWindow* parent, ChameleonWindow* mainFrame, wxWindowID id, const wxString& caption, const wxPoint& pos, const wxSize& size, long style )
00067 {
00068     Create(parent, id, caption, pos, size, style);
00069 
00070     
00071     SetAdvanced(false);
00072 
00073     wxFont monospacedFont(10, wxMODERN, wxNORMAL, wxNORMAL, false, "Courier New");
00074     m_textbox->SetFont(monospacedFont);
00075     m_grid->SetDefaultCellFont(monospacedFont);
00076     m_grid->SetEditable(false); 
00077     m_grid->SetGridLineColour(wxColour("black"));
00078     m_grid->SetColumnWidth(0, 200);
00079     m_grid->SetColumnWidth(1, 60);
00080     m_grid->SetColumnWidth(2, 480);
00081     m_grid->SetColLabelValue(0, "Filename");
00082     m_grid->SetColLabelValue(1, "Line");
00083     m_grid->SetColLabelValue(2, "Message");
00084     // turn off the grid selection cursor
00085     m_grid->SetCellHighlightPenWidth(0);
00086 
00087     m_mainFrame = mainFrame;
00088 
00089     ClearOutput();
00090 }

00107 
00108     CreateControls();

00120 void CompilerOutputPanel::CreateControls()
00121 {    
00123 
00124     CompilerOutputPanel* item1 = this;
00125 
00126     wxBoxSizer* item2 = new wxBoxSizer(wxVERTICAL);
00127     m_sizer = item2;
00128     item1->SetSizer(item2);
00129     item1->SetAutoLayout(TRUE);
00130 
00131     wxTextCtrl* item3 = new wxTextCtrl( item1, ID_COMPILERTEXT, _T(""), wxDefaultPosition, wxDefaultSize, wxTE_MULTILINE|wxTE_READONLY );
00132     m_textbox = item3;
00133     item2->Add(item3, 1, wxGROW|wxALL, 5);
00134 
00135     wxGrid* item4 = new wxGrid( item1, ID_COMPILERGRID, wxDefaultPosition, wxSize(200, 150), wxSUNKEN_BORDER );
00136     m_grid = item4;
00137     item4->SetDefaultColSize(80);
00138     item4->SetDefaultRowSize(20);
00139     item4->SetColLabelSize(20);
00140     item4->SetRowLabelSize(0);
00141     item4->CreateGrid(1, 3, wxGrid::wxGridSelectRows);
00142     item2->Add(item4, 1, wxGROW|wxALL, 5);
00143 
00145 }

00164 void CompilerOutputPanel::ClearOutput()
00165 {
00166     int numGridRows = m_grid->GetNumberRows();
00167     if(numGridRows > 0)
00168     {
00169         m_grid->DeleteRows(0, numGridRows);
00170     }
00171     
00172     m_textbox->SetValue(wxEmptyString);
00173     m_numErrors = 0;
00174 }

00186 void CompilerOutputPanel::SetAdvanced(bool advanced)
00187 {
00188     m_isAdvanced = advanced;
00189 
00190     m_sizer->Detach(m_grid);
00191     m_sizer->Detach(m_textbox);
00192 
00193     if(advanced)
00194     {
00195         m_textbox->Hide();
00196         m_sizer->Add(m_grid, 1, wxGROW|wxALL, 5);
00197         m_grid->Show();
00198     }
00199     else
00200     {
00201         m_grid->Hide();
00202         m_sizer->Add(m_textbox, 1, wxGROW|wxALL, 5);
00203         m_textbox->Show();
00204     }
00205     m_sizer->Layout();
00206 }

00218 void CompilerOutputPanel::OnCompilerStart(CompilerEvent& event)
00219 {
00220     //ClearOutput();
00221 
00222     wxFileName fn = event.GetFile();
00223     wxString filename = fn.GetFullPath(event.IsRemoteFile() ? wxPATH_UNIX : wxPATH_DOS);
00224 
00225     wxString compileOutput = "Compiling: " + filename;
00226     if(filename == "Linking") {
00227         //special case for Linking
00228         compileOutput = "Linking:";
00229     }
00230 
00231     //if(m_isAdvanced)
00232     //{
00233         int newRowNum = m_grid->GetNumberRows();
00234         m_grid->AppendRows(1);
00235         
00236         // merge all three cells in the new row into a single cell
00237         m_grid->SetCellSize(newRowNum, 0, 1, 3);
00238 
00239         m_grid->SetCellValue(compileOutput, newRowNum, 0);
00240     //}
00241     //else
00242     //{
00243         *m_textbox << compileOutput << "\r\n";
00244     //}
00245     
00246 }

00258 void CompilerOutputPanel::OnCompilerProblem(CompilerEvent &event)
00259 {
00260     wxFileName fn = event.GetFile();
00261     wxString filename = fn.GetFullPath(event.IsRemoteFile() ? wxPATH_UNIX : wxPATH_DOS);
00262 
00263     int linenum = event.GetInt();
00264     wxString lineString;
00265     lineString << linenum;
00266     wxString message = event.GetMessage();
00267     wxString output = event.GetGCCOutput(); 
00268     wxString outputCopy = output;
00269 
00270     wxRegEx reParseOutput("(?:(?:\\A|\\n)(.+?):(\\d+):(?:\\d+:)?(.+))", wxRE_ADVANCED);
00271 
00272     while(outputCopy != wxEmptyString)
00273     {
00274         wxString line = outputCopy.BeforeFirst('\r');
00275         outputCopy = outputCopy.AfterFirst('\n');
00276 
00277         if(reParseOutput.Matches(line))
00278         {
00279             m_numErrors++;
00280             size_t start = 0;
00281             size_t length = 0;
00282             int counter = 1;
00283 
00284             wxString parsedFile = reParseOutput.GetMatch(line, 1);
00285             wxString parsedLine = reParseOutput.GetMatch(line, 2);
00286             wxString parsedMessage = reParseOutput.GetMatch(line, 3);
00287 
00288             //if(m_isAdvanced)
00289             //{
00290                 int newRowNum = m_grid->GetNumberRows();
00291                 m_grid->AppendRows(1);
00292 
00293                 m_grid->SetCellValue(parsedFile, newRowNum, 0);
00294                 m_grid->SetCellValue(parsedLine, newRowNum, 1);
00295                 m_grid->SetCellValue(parsedMessage, newRowNum, 2);
00296                 m_grid->SetCellRenderer(newRowNum , 2, new wxGridCellAutoWrapStringRenderer);
00297             //}
00298             //else
00299             //{
00300             //  *m_textbox << parsedFile << ":" << parsedLine << ":" << parsedMessage << "\r\n";
00301             //}
00302         }
00303     }
00304 
00305     *m_textbox << output;
00306 }
00307 
00318 void CompilerOutputPanel::OnCompilerEnd(CompilerEvent &event)
00319 {
00320     wxFileName fn = event.GetFile();
00321     wxString filename = fn.GetFullPath(event.IsRemoteFile() ? wxPATH_UNIX : wxPATH_DOS);
00322     CompileResult cr = event.GetResult();
00323 
00324     wxString compileResult;
00325     switch(cr)
00326     {
00327         case CR_OK:
00328             compileResult = filename + " compiled successfully.";
00329             break;
00330         case CR_ERROR:
00331         {
00332             wxString errorResult;
00333             errorResult.Printf("Compilation failed. %d total errors / warnings.", m_numErrors);
00334             compileResult = errorResult;
00335             break;
00336         }
00337         case CR_TERMINATED:
00338             compileResult = "Compilation terminated by user.";
00339             break;
00340     }
00341 
00342     //if(m_isAdvanced)
00343     //{
00344         int newRowNum = m_grid->GetNumberRows();
00345         m_grid->AppendRows(1);
00346 
00347         // merge all three cells in the new row into a single cell
00348         m_grid->SetCellSize(newRowNum, 0, 1, 3);
00349 
00350         m_grid->SetCellValue(compileResult, newRowNum, 0);
00351     //}
00352     //else
00353     //{
00354         *m_textbox << "\r\n" << compileResult;
00355     //}
00356 }

00368 void CompilerOutputPanel::OnGridDoubleClick(wxGridEvent &event)
00369 {
00370     int rownum = event.GetRow();
00371     int cellSizeRows = 0;
00372     int cellSizeCols = 0;
00373     m_grid->GetCellSize(rownum, 0, &cellSizeRows, &cellSizeCols);
00374 
00375     // if this is greater than one, it's a non-problem row
00376     if(cellSizeCols == 1)
00377     {
00378         wxString filename = m_grid->GetCellValue(rownum, 0);
00379         wxString linestring = m_grid->GetCellValue(rownum, 1);
00380         long linenum = 0;
00381         linestring.ToLong(&linenum);
00382 
00383         m_mainFrame->FocusOnLine(filename, (int)linenum, false);
00384     }
00385     
00386 }

00397 void CompilerOutputPanel::SetFocus()
00398 {
00399     if(m_isAdvanced)
00400     {
00401         m_grid->SetFocus();
00402         m_grid->Refresh();
00403     }
00404     else
00405     {
00406         m_textbox->SetFocus();
00407         m_textbox->Refresh();
00408     }
00409 }
